headline.main: Scientists Pinpoint Brain Irregularities In Drug Addicts

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A RADICALLY new approach to fighting drug abuse is emerging from discoveries of brain irregularities that make certain people much quicker to become addicted than others, and much harder to cure.
docs.snippet: LEAD: A RADICALLY new approach to fighting drug abuse is emerging from discoveries of brain irregularities that make certain people much quicker to become addicted than others, and much harder to cure.
